entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 2:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 62 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2 except 6 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2 except 6 inland. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
